$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

cases.description: Reports for each of the test cases in this test scenario, in chronological order.

cleanup.description: If this test scenario performed cleanup, this report captures the relevant information.

documentation_url.description: URL at which this test scenario is described

end_time.description: Time at which the test scenario completed or encountered an error

execution_error.description: If there was an error while executing this test scenario, this field describes the error

notes.description: Additional information about this scenario that may be useful

$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

start_time.description: Time at which the test scenario started

successful.description: True iff test scenario completed normally with no failed checks
